title: How do I set a screen unlock pattern?
answer: [Go to Settings and touch Security >Unlock method > Pattern.]() On the Draw an unlock pattern screen, swipe your finger across the screen to connect four or more dots together in a pattern and touch Continue. Draw the pattern again and touch Confirm. When you power on your phone or press the power button to turn on the screen, the unlock screen is displayed by default. You can then draw the pattern to unlock the screen.
